utterances: I'm already thinking of ideas for your cake
That sounds great, what kind are you thinking of making?
Do you have any pets since you love dogs so much?
I do have a dog, she's a labradoodle named Leah. She's quite a handful but so very sweet. Do you have any pets?
Labradoodles are great! I have a dog as well - a chocolate lab. He's a good boy, but also a handful. Do you ever take Leah to the dog park?
I'm going shopping with my daughter
Have fun shopping with your daughter. Where are you going to take her shopping at?
Have you done any new watercolors lately.

I've been working on one for the past few days. The inspiration for this one comes from the happiness I felt when my son and I went to a baseball game a few days ago. I really enjoy taking him to games.
It's awesome that you're putting so much of your life and feelings into your work. What style is this one in -- abstract, or more realistic?
This one is abstract. I'm not much of a realistic painter. How about you? I know you like to make watercolor paintings also. Have you done any recently?
Not since we last talked. My workload with school was too heavy because it was the end of the first summer session.
I remember what school is like, I don't envy you at all haha! How did you do in your classes?
I'm waiting to find out my final grades, but I think I did all right. Have you had any inspiration for a new watercolor yet?

That's really good to hear, I'm sure you did great! Yes I have, but I won't put those inspirations to paper yet, at least not until I finish the painting I'm currently working on. There's so much inspiration you can gather just from day to day experiences, and you can paint them however you feel. That's why I love abstract so much.
Say, are you a complete vegetarian or do you eat seafood? I was thinking you, your son and I could get together for a baseball game, and then have dinner at that crab shack on the pier.
Guess who I ran in to at the bar AGAIN? Jimmy Fallon! I think we are going to be friends now.
Ha, how funny! Is that like the second or third time you've met him now?
The third. I can't believe it. He's such a cool guy, and we have so much in common. I think we're going to play video games together. You should join us!
I would love to. He seems super chill. When do you think he will be coming by?
Not sure yet. We didn't set a date or anything. What kind of games do you think would work with 3 players?>
Maybe a shooter or something like that? Sports would be pretty awkward with three. Do you know what kind of games he likes?
I mentioned your baking to one of my coworkers.
Oh, really what did they have to say? If they want to see how good I am I'm going to be on that new show Best Baker.
I was just about to ask you about reality baking shows! Is Best Baker your favorite? They said to find out where you work, if you're interested in their business.

My wife and I own our own business. It is called Baking A Dream. Best Baker is a new show coming out so can't really say it is my favorite, but it will be fun to be on it and get my business name out there.
Absolutely. That's a great name. Congratulations on getting on the show! When does it start airing?
We go start filming next week. And I believe they said it would start airing a month after we finish the last episode. There are 12 of us competing.
Oh wow. Best of luck to you. Will your wife be on the show, too?
No, she has to stay home and take care the dogs. Since Major has that virus we don't want to leave him with anyone else.

That's understandable. When you're on the set for the show, just focus on your baking and nothing else that's going on in your life. Will Major be cured, or will the dog have to deal with the virus forever?
What's the coolest thing you've seen while scuba diving?
I saw a sunken ship. Have you ever seen anything like that or gone scuba diving?
No, I haven't been scuba driving but I want to. I haven't seen anything cool like at all I wish I could.
It was pretty cool, but I kept thinking about the JAWS movie. I know you like horror films. Have you seen that one?
Yes, I have. Trust me I think about that all the time being a lifeguard. We always have the one jerk that yells shark and we have to get everyone out of the water.
Really?! That's crazy. Have you ever seen a shark while on patrol?
Yes, once. It was crazy we had to shut the whole bench down for the day. There was like a group of them.
That sounds really scary to me. I've been to Hawaii 3 times and have never seen any. How did you like lifeguarding besides all of that?
I have been working so much lately, but I like to chill out by watching Star Wars and Brad Pitt movies.
That's cool. What's your favorite Brad Pitt movie?
I loved him in Seven and more recently in Ad Astra
Seven was a good one. I haven't seen Ad Astra. I just re-watched Once Upon A Time in Hollywood last night, that's a good one. What's playing at your theater these days?
Godzilla vs. Kingkong, Raya and the Last Dragon, and the Courier. I mostly excited about the last two. What about you?
I'm not even sure. The last few movies I saw were kids' movies with my boys. I haven't heard of the Courier - what's that one about?
Where do you take hikes with your husky?
Over the local park usually, they love the space! How about you?
I normally try and find a trail somewhere. The uneven terranin tires us both out. At this point in the year the goal is to just get it done before dark/
That's true - plus safety too. Though the German Sheps should help. Have you been playing any good games lately?
I've been to busy. A couple games on my phone when I have a moment of down time but thats about it. How about you?
A little exploration game on the Nintendo, sorta space themed. I feel that on time! Work's been crazy busy lately - shifted a lot of remote control Jeeps lately. How's the job going?
It goes well. It's something I enjoy but I let it consume me at times. What drives the shift to Jeeps? Is it the weather?
Does your band have any upcoming shows?
Yeah we have been having some success in getting our name out there. We even have a gig in Nevada! You can give me the authentic tour after the gig haha
I would love to know if that works out. It would be fun to go see a show. It's been awhile for me and I should venture out more. Do you sing in the band?
I do for most of our songs but occasionaly I play bass. Though to be honest I would rather avoid it as it ruins my nails! Do you not get back to Nevada very often then?

I have family in Carson City and I try to get back there every 3 months. You mentioned that you like to paint your nails, I never thought about how tough it is on them if you play bass. What color are they currently?
Orange of course! Never anything else! Not only is it the best colour I think it matches our bands image.

hahaha.... I should have thought of that. It's too bad your moped is not orange as well. But I think orange and hot pink go great together too!! Since orange matches the image of your band, do you consider your band edgy?
I just found out I'm playing at the punk rock club tomorrow if you can make it.
Awesome! What time? I'd love to make it if I can.
Would you like to come to my farm and see the horses?
Yes I love horses. Are they friendly?
They're very friendly. A few of them get a bit excited around people, but all of them are very friendly.
That is good, I would love to spend some time with them. Do you ride them?
I do! I ride all of them! I wish I had more time to ride horses, though. My job gets kind of busy sometimes.
Wow, that must take up a lot of time riding all 12! I bet you cannot ride them every week though?
I try to ride for a bit every weekend. But yeah, it's hard to get to all 12. I've got to cycle through.
Do you have a favorite one? I bet they all have very different personalities?
I like the Mongol horse, just because she's easy to mount and dismount. But yes, I like all of them.
What is a Mongol horse, never heard of on of them?
I just had a big update on that case I was telling you about.
Oooh what's the update? I'm intrigued
They found the murder weapon, but it has like 3 different prints on it.
Oh wow, that's so weird! Are any of the prints the suspect's? Sounds like something fishy was going on, I wonder if multiple people were involved
I would love to do some communtiy volunteer work with you to help out our community. Where would you like to volunteer at since you are not particularly found of the animal shelter?
I actually want to volunteer at the animal shelter. i think it may help me to get over my dislike of cats if I have some good experiences with them. plus the dogs are so cute.
Oh, I must have misunderstood! That's a great idea. It's such a good feeling to help out at the shelter... they always appreciate it. When do you want to volunteer?
I'm available this weekend if that works for you?
My Dad got back to me and said that he would love to go to a Muse concert in Vegas!
Oh you should totally do it! I had such a fun time in Vegas. Are they playing there any time soon?
I haven't looked up their tour schedule yet, but I hope so! I think it'd be a really fun trip, even though I don't like Vegas that much

Were you just around the trashy parts? They have some great vegan restaurants. And the M&M store is just fun to see (even though you won't eat the milk). Is your dad into Muse? Or just wanting to go to a concert?
Have you decided on a good weekend for us to meet up and go hiking together?
Yes. I was thinking that June 19 and 20 works for me. It's Father's day on Sunday, but I'm not planning anything special. Does that work for you?
Yes, that definitely works for me. It's a plan! Do you still want to hit up the Appalachian Trail near my place like we discussed? You're welcome to my place for dinner after we've been hiking.
That would be awesome! What can I bring? How about a nice bottle of wine? Then after dinner we can relax and talk about the trail and any new books you have read.

If you'd like, I never say no to a bottle of wine to go with dinner! Thanks! Yeah that sounds awesome. A perfect way to wind down after the hike. Have you made any progress really with moving your career into book publishing?
Yes, I've actually started to make some progress. I got listed with Bowker Books as a publishing company. Now I need to purchase ISBN numbers to go on the back of the books. At least it's a start.
That's great to hear, I'm really glad you're making progress. Bowker Books? I've never heard of them. I know if you publish on Amazon / Kindle KDP you get free ISBN numbers for your titles.
I have found a really interesting museum in portland that I'd like to go to
That's cool. So you're going to check it out when you travel to Portland on business? What's the museum all about?
I went and looked at a blue chevy durax today.
Ha. How did you like it? Blue chevy durax is my favorite you know! Do you still drive your ford pickup truck?
I purchased my ticket and will be visiting Vegas next week.
Oh really? Will you be doing a lot of gambling or will you be mainly visiting shows and attractions?
I painted a new picture of my two kids!
Tell me more. What type of paint did you use, and did you paint it on a canvas?
I like acrylics because they are vibrant and easy to clean up/
I'll take your word for it. I'm not much of an artist. I'd rather be riding my ATV or jamming to tunes while I do stuff around the house.
So I could paint you riding your frour-wheeler. Are there woods in your area to ride it?
Yes, now that it's warming up I can hit some of the great trails nearby that BMX riders, dirt bikers, and ATV enthusiasts ride on.
Glad you have folks out there with you, good companionship and folks that can call for help if there is a problem.
It sure is nice to be close to family. How old are your two kids, by the way? What are they into?

The twins are in second grade, they just had a lovely service in church this morning, that is why I painted them in their white dresses. My family is quite important to me as well. Hope yours stay healthy this summer.
I'd really love to see that painting. I'm sure your daughters look adorable in their Sunday best. And thank you, I extend my best wishes to your family as well.
You never mentioned what kind of music uplifts you when you sing around the house?
I mentioned your baking to one of my coworkers.
Oh, really what did they have to say? If they want to see how good I am I'm going to be on that new show Best Baker.
My kids are so impressed that you've seen a shark!
haha glad that impressed them. It's quite scary though when youre out there surfing!
I'll bet! I've read that attacks are rare, but I'm still pretty afraid of them. How about jellyfish? Have you ever been stung?
No, I've never been stung, but I have seen people get stung! It looks really painful. How old are your kids?
My dog just did something so funny that I have got to tell you
What did your dog do?
Where do you like to go hiking?
I like to go around the lake at one of our local parks.
Sounds nice! Do you like to listen to Travis Scott while you hike?
Not really. I'd rather listen to the sounds of nature.
Yeah I prefer that too when i play basketball with my sister. We went today to the courts and played 2 games. I won both times! Did you see any fish in the lake?
Have you been outside lately?
Yeah, I try to get outside to exercise every day. How about you? Been out in your Jeep lately?
I haven't been outside exercising, but I have been out driving my Jeep through the woods! Last weekend, I saw a huge buck with a nice rack of antlers.
That sounds awesome! I love to go wheeling but haven't been in forever! That's really cool you saw that big buck? Do you hunt?
I was just listening to some 2pac and thinking about ya!
That's great, did you play it on those awesome speakers you have in that BMW? I always loved that car, it is so cool!
How's the new house coming along?
it's going great! I am glad to finally be settling in but we really need furniture. any suggestions on where to shop?
I do not really know of a place to shop for furniture. How long are your going to be in the house before you move into the bigger on?
I hope we are here for a long time. I want my family to have stability, you know?

I did not think you had children? I guess you mean your dogs? I though you wanted yo move into a bigger house soon? I was going to say wait and get furniture when you move into the bogger house you was talking about.

I don't have children, but I think of my pets as my family. their lives are shorter than human lives, and I don't wanna keep destabilizing them. I do ultimately wanna live somewhere bigger, but not for a long time yet.
I know what you mean about pets being like children. Where are you thinking of getting furniture from? What all do you have to get?

I think I will try shopping online so I can jsut have everything delivered and not deal with sales people! maybe amazon? or world market? I need to get two couches and some arm chairs for the formal living room
I found my paintings that I did from some horror films so that I can show you when we meet
Which horror films were they from?
Halloween, The Cabin In the Woods, and Hannibal. I feel these are some of the best ones. I put a lot of work into them. Have you seen any of those movies?
I bet there were some really good scenes to paint from those films. I'd like to have a go at painting but no idea where to start.

I feel painting should come natural. I've read a few books about painting, but I'd say 99% of how I learned to and what I know about painting came from just sitting down and painting and seeing what works for me. The first thing I painted that was quite decent was a picture of an apple on a kitchen table.
Oh really? I fear that I might not be cut out for painting then. It is something that definitely does not come naturally to me.

Well, you could train yourself so that it does come natural. I also like to paint people dressed in scary costumes. I once painted a scene of one of my kid wearing his Chucky costume as he was running around in one of Freddy Kreuger's nightmares.
Is that possible, to train yourself? I do like art about scary movies. Maybe I should try what you did and choose my favorite film and see what comes to mind.
Yes, you can train yourself to feel natural doing anything. What did you paint while in Spain?
It was nothing very good. I learnt mostly how to draft the basic shape of fruit. Not very exciting!
That's a good start. That is similar to how I started. Sometimes I have dreams about the paintings I do. They are weird and scary.
What makes them weird? I always have strange drams right after watching a horror film.
I braided my horses' hair. Do you want to see?
Yes!!... email me the pic! Did you color her mane too?
I'm going on another blind date this weekend.

That's great! I'm glad you're out there trying to find someone. Would you be willing to tell me about how it went, why you chose this particular person, that kind of thing? As you know I'm writing a book on blind dates and I'd love to "interview" you.
I Got injured in Football practice today, and have busted my leg up pretty bad. Any books you could recommend for me while I'm laid up?
I mean anything from Jane Austen. They would help you pick up a girl once your back on your feet.
I could be a good idea, it is like Sarah Key?
I haven't read that so I don't know, but Pride and Prejudice is my favorite. How did you hurt yourself?
At football practice. Now I can't play footbal nor surf, I guess I'll have to focus on my studies and reading. What do you like about Jane Austen?
Her stories are very engaging. You really feel like you know the character, their joys and sadness. What is Sarah Key about?
Sarah's Key is about a Jewish girl in Paris in WW2. It has won many awards.
I will have to check it out I guess. How long do you have to be off your leg?
The cats have been indoors because of the cold weather, but they've been playing like crazy.
That sounds fun! I have been baking during my breaks.
What have you been baking? I have started baking bread since I have been working at home
I made some chocolate chip muffins today and will make some banana bread tomorrow. I love the smell of fresh bread.
Me too! Unfortunately my cats sometimes like to steal my loaves. What kind of law do you practice?
I have been working in real estate law for 10 years. I didn't know cats liked bread. Do you feed them human food often?

They like it, but they can't digest it -- I have to wrestle it away from them! I like to spoil my cats, I think I cook for them as often as I cook for myself. Real estate law sounds very interesting, why did you choose that field?
I wish I had a cat but I am allergic. I was a legal assistant in the field before law school, and had a guaranteed job upon graduation. It pays really well. What do you do?
I'm a technology consultant for a small firm, I like that I get to work from home but I get tired of conference calls all day
What kind of technology? I can imagine talking all day gets boring. Do you ever get to go to meetings?
I drove from Massachusetts to California this week.
Wow! That is a long drive. I went to college in California at Pomona College. How many days did the drive take? Where you delivering anything interesting?

I talked to my family, and Sparky ended up wining the Kentucky Derby yesterday. I am so proud of him. I wish I was there to see his victory, but my family recorded it so I could give it a watch. You should give it a watch as well.
That's great, I'll borrow the recording whenever I see you again. Is Sparky going to any other Derbys?

Great news! I landed the role in the off-Broadway play! I get to play the woman who killed her husband! Strange thing to be excited about, I know, but it's a big step in furthering my career as an actor!
Haha hey that's fantastic news!! When do you start practicing and when do your shows start? I have to make sure I'm there for you!
Thanks! Rehearsal starts next week. I think I will for sure need you to help me run some lines. Already getting a little nervous!
I'm nervous for you!! Is this your first real acting gig??
Yup! Besides a few staring roles in my elementary school play LOL How are your classes going?

You have to start somewhere! I'm so excited for you. My classes are going great, I just feel so lucky that I'm so passionate about what I'm studying...I don't think that's the case with a lot of my friends. I'm hoping to get an internship this summer at a cancer center. It would be such a great opportunity to learn more from them!
Wow, that's awesome. I love that you are going to make a huge difference in the world! It's always a good thing being passionate about the work you do.
Thank you! I know you're just as passionate about acting and writing. What do you do to get over your stage fright though? Imagine everyone in their underwear?! Wonder if that really works..
We got a new animal on the farm.
Cool. What kind did you get? Pig? Cow? Horse? More dogs?
I decided to start my own blog site!
That's exciting! I love blogging. What do you want to blog about?
I think that I would want to blog about different people that I talk to at the mall. It could be interesting since I meet so many unique people!
That's a really different idea. I think it could work. I find people fascinating. Did you decide on a name yet?
Oh man. Maybe something funny like Mall Rats? Or maybe something like People of the Mall? What is your blog called?
Cute! I love it. Mine's called Greaner Good. It's a Vegan lifestyle blog. I review restaurants, talk recipes, and just general Vegan friendly articles.
That's such a clever name! I've thought about being vegetarian. Does your blog have any good tips?
It has tons. I started it when I decided to go Vegan, so there's a lot of good tips about starting out with a new diet/lifestyle. Why are you thinking to go vegetarian, if you don't mind me asking?
I would like to do something to help with climate change and I know that eating less meat can really help. Why did you decide to go vegan?
It was just the logical next step. I tried to avoid animal products as a vegetarian, so switching over to completely vegan made sense. It's all around better for our Earth and environment.

It definitely seems like it has gotten much easier over the years as more companies and restaurants have started to offer more vegetarian and vegan options. Do you talk about that in your restaurant review blog?
I applied for the paralegal job. Hopefully I heard back soon.
Oh, that would be so great if you get it! that would give you such an advantage at getting into a good law school.
I know. I'm so nervous. My hands were shaking when I was uploading my resume. Have you figured out what activities you'll be doing with the kids this summer?
With money being short, we'll probably do a lot of day trips. The park is always nice and we have a lake close by.
Oh the lake sounds wonderful. Do you enjoy swimming?
I do more wadding than swimming. I enjoy the water, but I'm not a strong swimmer. How's the horse training going?
Nugget is stubborn as a mule, he doesn't want to jump, so it's slow going. He's so funny though, and temperamental. He just requires patience. Kind of like kids, right? LOL
You know it! How old is nugget?
The show went great and my mom got a deal with a major clothing line.
That's awesome! What clothing lie did your Mom make a deal with?
I am loving my internship but commuting to it without a car is hard!
It is hard but my car payment is a lot of money so you are smart to go without one. How is your snake?
Not so well, he ate my roommates hamster yesterday. It was extremely sad and I feel quite guilty.
Oh no that is terrible! Are you going to get your roommate another hamster?
Hi Ricky! Hope everything is going good with your son and the car dealership is doing well.
Hi Ptosis! Sadly the car dealership I'm working at is in a bad condition right now. I might need to start looking for a new job. My son is doing well, he's at a difficult age though. How is your son?
He is well! He starts 3rd grade next year! How old is your son?
He is turning 13 this month. He complains a lot every time my wife ask his help to tend the garden.
Oh! My son loves to garden with me! We are growing lots of vegetables right now!
That's so nice! What vegetables do you have in your garden?
We are growing broccoli and green beans right now! What are you growing in your garden?
We have lettuces, potatoes, and carrots, and trying to start with Kale. My wife tends to the herb garden in the corner, but I don't quite get what's in there.
That's great! I love kale! Hopefully when it is warmer we can grow some more fruits!
What fruits do you have in mind? We grew tomatoes before (if they counts as fruits), but the demand is low for that in my family we so stopped growing them.
I saw a sign up sheet at my local grocery store for a 5k run. I think I'm going to sign up for it!
Oh really? That's so exciting! Are you ready for it?? Do you have any training before the run?
I started talking the vitamin D since the last time we talked. Hopefully it helps my health!
How long ago have you started taking it? I really hope it does help you.
I created an Etsy account and listed a few of my woodworking projects. Just sold my first one. I didn't realize Etsy took a percentage of the sale.
Wow congratulations. I guess all online services took some of the percentage. How much did they take?
It's a 5% transaction fee and another if you use their site for processing the money. I guess it's not terrible, but I may have to raise my price a little to account for it.
Yeah that would be a great idea. I have never used Etsy though. Can you sell music on Etsy too?

I believe so. There are just things like medicines and weapons that are forbidden. I think most of the time people sell homemade goods. I bet you could look into something like bandcamp? I know it came up when I was looking at, mostly, independent online selling marketplaces.
that's amazing. I'll probably check it out. I might try the artist Spotify version for my music. Did i tell you I'm recording in a studio next week.
Oh wow! Are you excited? Do you have some tracks already worked out when you get there?
Does your son help you in the bakery?

He loves to help, he even has his own tiny apron and foot stool to reach the counter. It's how we spend quality time together. Do you have a favorite sweet? I'd like to send you one from the bakery to try!
That sounds so precious! Hm, I'd say my favorite sweet would be a danish or something along those lines! I'd love to try anything you make. Maybe I'll visit the bakery soon.

Thank you! That's totally doable, I'll have something special for you the next time you drop in. We also got a new coffee maker, we've been experimenting with white coffees and they are delicious! Are you a coffee drinker?
I love coffee. I can't start the day without it. Though, usually I get iced coffee since it's so hot in Vegas!

That's right, I don't know how you can handle the heat! Anything over 85 and I am sweating bullets. Do you think you could come by for a visit soon? We could always use an extra hand if you're ever looking into learning about baking!
My book just got published
What?! Wow! When will I be able to buy it?

You can buy it now! its available on major platforms, I am so happy that Barnes and Noble, picked it up! I am so excited. I am hoping that my steampunk romance book does well. What is your current read?
It's called "Our Love Story in China". It's a memoir. I'll be sure to buy a copy of your book this weekend.

Nice! whats the plot? I am on the market for a new read, I finally have time to read something else. Boy! writing my own book was stressful. Thank you so much for the Cinnamon rolls, they were delicious. I tried the recipe you gave me and I almost set my house on fire lol.
Haha! Glad you're okay! The book I'm reading is about a couple finding eachother during China's cultural revolution. I really like learning about Chinese history so it's right up my alley.

Wondering if the cultural revolution is based on facts? I would google the book and read a bit more about it. China has such rich culture and delicious food! my favorite dish has to be fish swimming in pickles, I know super weird name, but its fish fillet in a broth with pickled vegetables and peppercorn, I have never in my life tasted something so bold and delicious.
Oh thanks for the advice, I will google it. Have you don't much chinese cooking?

No, I dont know how to cook chinese food, I have a hard time finding some of the ingredients. I did made orange chicken before, it came out okay, but nowhere near to what restaurants serve, do you know how to cook chinsese food?
Not really, but I did try making baozi recently, steamed pork buns. They were really good. I also have a hard time finding the right ingredients.
Baozi? what is that? Oh! I lied I know how to make fried dumplins, so so so so delicious! now baking, I cannot bake at alllll. i dont know how people do it.
The meatloaf was fabulous tonight!
That's awesome! I need to try it sometime! I'm always so busy, I never have time to cook! Between activities we usually just stop and get fast food.
Kids can make eating at home difficult if you're running around a lot. How's the brunch club? DO you at least get that in?
Yeah, I make time for that. It usually the only time I get to sit down! And sometimes at night when I have my apple martini! How's your car doing? Did you get the throw up smell out?
How is New York City?
Cold!! Colder even than Portland, I think.
Definitely! I don't know how you do it. but I guess i would give up Portland for the art and culture in NYC
Maybe you just need a little bit more time to settle-don't give up yet. Have you been able to connect with any other artists since you moved?
Yes and no. It's like any new place and it takes time to meet people. I just met this artist who makes these huge concrete pots. so impressive
That is one of the best parts about artistry-the diversity within it. What is your medium, for your art? I'm guessing the concrete pot person is not working in their home, lol.
I went to a new restaurant and tried Thai food for the first time.
What dish did you end up trying and did you enjoy it?
I saw a really interesting show that explained how to deal with kids who are acting up.
Oh, really? What did it suggest?
Have you been able to move your van lately?
I actually bought a condo yesterday! I'll probably sell my van soon. How are your workouts going?
Wow that is amazing, bet you'll miss that van though! Pretty great, I'll miss eating so much fast food though.
Yeah, but it's a great habit to break out of. I have to eat fast food because I can't really afford anything else. How are you popular?
Clean eating doesn't have to be expensive, you just have to plan your meals in advance! I actually run a podcast that I do every week.
Really? That's great, what's it called. Now that I have a kitchen I might be able to cook more and eat better! Also, I'm getting along with co-workers more often now!
It's called Dude Soup, me and my friends get together and talk about our favourite soups. That's great news, have you made any friends at your job yet?

Not quite, however we started sharing more interests, turns out we all love video games. Tomorrow it's planned that we are all going to play together! Dude Soup sounds like a pretty cool podcast, now don't hate me for this but, I dislike soup.
Video games are a great shared interent, I love talking about them with my friends. That's a shame, do you really not like any flavour of soup?
I made a new pasta recipe last night. It was really good, and instant hit with the family.
Nice what was in it? Meatballs I hope!
I went to the Mall and bought a Wii
Cool! Did you get any fun games for it? I used to play Wii Sports all the time.
What was your profession before you retired?
I was a fictional author. Do you read alot?

What are some other classical pieces you'd recommend for someone unfamiliar with it?

If you have ever heard the iconic Jaws theme -- duuuuhhh DUUHUHHH... Dvorak's (I pronounce it Duh-vor-CZAK) ninth symphony actually has that same theme, but it builds into something really interesting.
So John Williams stole from the best... He's pretty smart then! Genius steals. Ninth symphony? I think I've heard Beethoven's ninth. Is Dvorak German? Austrian?

Dvorak is Czech and born near Prague, though it was part of the Austrian Empire when he was born. You will find that John Williams borrowed a lot of themes, though he puts them to good use. The opening to Star Wars is right out of film music by Korngold!
